post:
Please see our F.A.Q. page and About page if you have any questions.


  • Zero overselling policy, zero bad reviews so far, zero drama, in-house support team (NO OUTSOURCING), no issues left unresolved, customer satisfaction guaranteed or your money back!
  • PBX-in-a-flash (asterisk) OS template available with all VPS plans (no management/support for PBX)
  • Ubuntu/Debian with Gnome, VNC and Firefox OS template available with all VPS plans
  • Custom made CentOS + nginx as reverse proxy to apache2 lightweight and fully optimized OS template for your high

    traffic sites free custom setup to your requirements

# Hardware nodes specifications

CPU: Core2quad 6600/8200/9400/9550
RAM: Fully buffered DDR2 800MHZ 8 - 16GB
Disks: Hitachi HDT72101 2 x 1TB in hardware RAID1 100MB/s (real, tested with hdparm)
Network: Dedicated 100mbp/s full-duplex port
OS: Centos 5 64bit openvz kernel, VPS panel linked to customer's WHMCS area
Capped at 15 VPS servers per node.
All hardware is owned and still under warranty.

Money back guarantee and 99.9% uptime guarantee or credited accordingly.
